About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do

Career Objective

Motivated and detail-oriented IT graduate from Monash University providing a range of transferable skills acquired from academic projects, part-time employment and previous internships. With excellent communication skills and strong teamwork capabilities along with extensive knowledge of HTML, CSS and JS is keen to contribute to a dynamic organisation as a Front-End Developer.
